Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Kanti akude kucace na kwabo bawuphila ilifa umhlaba belandela emva kwabangaphambili kubo ababekuwo, okokuba, ukuba SaSithandile, ngeSaSibohlwayile ngezono zabo. Kananjalo Thina Siyazitywina iintliziyo zabo khon’ukuze bangeva nto

Ezo zizixeko eSibalisa ibali lazo kuwe (wena Muhammad). Ke kaloku Inene kwafika abaThunywa bazo kuzo benemiqondiso ecacileyo, kodwa bona babengekhe bakholwe koko babesele bekwalile kwantlandlolo. Uzitywina kanjalo ke uAllâh iintliziyo zabangakholwayo
Ke kaloku uninzi lwabo Salufumana lungenanyaniso kwiminqophiso yalo, endaweni yoko uninzi lwabo Salufumana ngenene lungabenzi bobubi
Emva kwabo ke Sathumela uMûsâ nemiqondiso yeThu kuFir’awn neenkosi zakhe, kodwa ngobugwenxa (babo) azanga bayamkele. Jonga ke ukuba sabanjani na isiphelo sabenzi bobutshinga
Ke kaloku uMûsâ wathi: “Hini na Fir’awn! Inene mna ndinguMthunywa ovela kwiNkosi yamaphakade.”
Kolunga kum ukuba ndingathethi ngoAllâh koko ibe yinyaniso kuphela. Mna ndize kuwe ndisuka eNkosini yakho nomqondiso ocacileyo. Ke khulula aBantwana bakwaSirayeli bahambe nam.”
UFir’awn wathi: “Ukuba uze nomqondiso, yiza nawo ngaphambili siwubone, ukuba ungomnye wabo banenyaniso.”
Wajula intonga yakhe uMûsâ, khangela ke! (Nantso) iba yinyoka ngokucacileyo
Waza wakhupha isandla sakhe, khangela ke (naso) sisiba mhlophe kwababesibukele
